title: Build task management application with authentication and CRUD operations

requirements.text: Implement user authentication and authorization using Internet Identity integration
acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
Only authenticated users can access task management features
User sessions persist across page refreshes
Unauthenticated users see a login prompt

requirements.text: Create backend data model and API for tasks with fields: title, description, status (pending/in-progress/completed), due date, and created timestamp
acceptanceCriteria: Task data structure stores all required fields
Each task is associated with the authenticated user's principal
Tasks are persisted in stable memory across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Implement create task functionality allowing users to add new tasks with title, description, status, and due date
acceptanceCriteria: Users can submit a form to create new tasks
Form validates required fields before submission
New tasks appear immediately in the task list after creation
Success feedback is shown to the user

requirements.text: Implement read/list task functionality displaying all tasks for the authenticated user with filtering by status
acceptanceCriteria: Users see a list of all their tasks on the main screen
Tasks can be filtered by status (all/pending/in-progress/completed)
Task list shows title, status, and due date for each task
Empty state is shown when no tasks exist

requirements.text: Implement update task functionality allowing users to edit task details and change task status
acceptanceCriteria: Users can click on a task to edit its details
Task status can be updated via dropdown or status buttons
Changes are persisted to the backend immediately
Updated tasks reflect changes in the UI without page refresh

requirements.text: Implement delete task functionality allowing users to remove tasks
acceptanceCriteria: Users can delete tasks via a delete button
Confirmation prompt appears before deletion
Deleted tasks are removed from the UI immediately
Backend removes the task from storage

requirements.text: Implement responsive design that adapts seamlessly to desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes

quotes: Responsive design for web and mobile screens

acceptanceCriteria: Layout adjusts appropriately for screens from 320px to 1920px wide
Navigation and forms remain usable on mobile devices
Touch targets are appropriately sized for mobile interaction
Content reflows without horizontal scrolling on small screens

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual design system with a professional, productivity-focused aesthetic using clean typography, consistent spacing, and a modern color palette that avoids blue and purple combinations
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design follows a consistent theme throughout the application
Color palette emphasizes productivity and clarity
Typography hierarchy is clear and readable
Interactive elements have clear visual feedback states

constraints: Must use Internet Identity for authentication (no third-party auth services)
Must use single-actor Motoko backend architecture
Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Must use Tailwind CSS for styling
Frontend immutable paths must not be modified
nonGoals: Real-time updates using WebSockets (not supported by platform)
Integration with external task management services
Team collaboration features or shared tasks
Task categories or tags beyond status field
File attachments or comments on tasks
